title: C++ error (its a nightmare)
body:
Hey guys, so recently I tried installing league to my laptop ( I have windows 10). I got stopped at the C++ install. I end up having to cancel it but then it still goes into my list for "uninstall a program". I've tried uninstalling and going directly to the Microsoft websites download, but it gives the same error. Please help, i'm going through a league withdrawal.
PS. Riot Eambo touched on this, but his link to resolve it has closed.{{item:3070}}

replies.body: This usually happens after a reformat or out of date OS that doesn't have the necessary products to install League.  I'm not sure which resource you downloaded, but usually [Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) link does the trick.  Make sure your OS is up to date as well!
